A '''Fire Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Fire-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh |- | Charmander || | Cyndaquil || Torchic || Chimchar |- | Growlithe || | Slugma || || |- | Ponyta || | Houndour || || |- | Vulpix || | Magby || || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Cinnabar Island || | 1000 Quest Points |- | Hearthome City || | 1000 Quest Points |- | Lavaridge Town || | 1000 Quest Points |- | Ecruteak City || | 1000 Quest Points |} {{Eggs}}
